General.Name: nForce Secure Public Company Limited
General.Description: nForce Secure Public Company Limited distributes IT security, information management, and network solutions. The company also involved in the sale of computer hardware and software, and related equipment; network communication equipment; and develops enterprise software, as well as provides project management, business consulting, risk assessment, and planning and training services. It delivers software and products for network security system, endpoint security system, and network performance and monitoring, as well as installation, training, and maintenance services. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
